items.sentence: Tom never told anyone where he hid the gold coins.

What kind of people write fortune cookie messages?
I\'ll come after I\'ve finished doing my homework.
This isn\'t the first time that this has happened.
Tom can\'t afford to send his children to college.
Girls don\'t wear skirts as often as they used to.
Let\'s stop for a rest somewhere with a good view.
A taxi to the airport costs around thirty dollars.
A young girl on crutches asked Tom where he lived.
I think that you and Tom could make a cute couple.
I think we are much better off than we used to be.
I think we should tell Tom that he has to do that.

Tom gets angry at the slightest hint of criticism.
Tom seems to be trying to impress the new manager.

I think you want this more than you want to admit.
